[DQR.IFRS.0080.8615] ifrs-full:AmountRemovedFromReserveOfCashFlowHedgesAndIncludedInInitialCostOrOtherCarryingAmountOfNonfinancialAssetLiabilityOrFirmCommitmentForWhichFairValueHedgeAccountingIsApplied has a value of -4,000,000 which is less than zero. This element should not have a negative value.
The properties of this ifrs-full:AmountRemovedFromReserveOfCashFlowHedgesAndIncludedInInitialCostOrOtherCarryingAmountOfNonfinancialAssetLiabilityOrFirmCommitmentForWhichFairValueHedgeAccountingIsApplied fact are: Period :2020-01-01 to 2020-12-31 Dimensions : Unit : EUR Rule version: 18.0.0RC1 - https://filings.xbrl.org/5493009YRUJJDCFF0R80/2021-12-31/ESEF/FI/0/Outokumpu-2021-12-31-en.zip/Outokumpu-2021-12-31-en/reports/Outokumpu-2021-12-31-en.xhtml 11870

[DQR.IFRS.0105.9556] The following elements are in the presentation linkbase of 04 - Statement of cash flows but are not included in any calculation relationship in the filing. ifrs-full:InterestPaidClassifiedAsOperatingActivities, ifrs-full:AdjustmentsForDecreaseIncreaseInTradeAndOtherReceivables, outokumpu:InterestAndDividendsReceived, ifrs-full:AdjustmentsForIncreaseDecreaseInTradeAndOtherPayables, ifrs-full:IncreaseDecreaseInWorkingCapital, ifrs-full:AdjustmentsForDecreaseIncreaseInInventories, outokumpu:ProvisionsAndEmployeeBenefitObligationsPaid, ifrs-full:ProfitLoss All elements appearing in the face of the financial statements should be included in a calculation relationship somewhere in the filing.
This rule will produce an error irrespective of a fact value being entered for the item(s) listed above.
If the item is an additional disclosure in the cash flow statement then make sure that is included as a child of DisclosureOfCashFlowStatementExplanatory or the following abstracts IncomeTaxesPaidRefundAbstract, CashAndCashEquivalentsIfDifferentFromStatementOfFinancialPositionAbstract, DisclosureOfReconciliationOfLiabilitiesArisingFromFinancingActivitiesAbstract, ChangesInLiabilitiesArisingFromFinancingActivitiesAbstract or DisclosureOfReconciliationOfLiabilitiesArisingFromFinancingActivitiesLineItems.
Rule Element Id:9556 Rule version: 18.0.0RC1 -

[DQR.IFRS.0129.9602] It is expected that SharePremium with a value of 717,000,000 reported in the network role http://www.outokumpu.com/roles/StatementOfFinancialPosition should be equal to the dimensionally qualified concept, Equity with the dimension ifrs-full:ComponentsOfEquityAxis = ifrs-full:SharePremiumMember and a reported value of 714,000,000 multiplied by 1. This value appears in the network role http://www.outokumpu.com/roles/StatementOfChangesInEquity. This error occurs when the dimensionally qualified fact is not equal to the value input for the non dimensional item.
The properties of this ifrs-full:SharePremium fact are:
Period : 2021-12-31 Dimensions : Unit : EUR Decimals of SharePremium : -6 Decimals of Equity : -6 Rule version: 18.0.0RC1 - https://filings.xbrl.org/5493009YRUJJDCFF0R80/2021-12-31/ESEF/FI/0/Outokumpu-2021-12-31-en.zip/Outokumpu-2021-12-31-en/reports/Outokumpu-2021-12-31-en.xhtml 11870
